comments.Description: Unique ID of command
Type of command, defaults to 1
ID of the parent application
guild id of the command, if not global
Name of command, 1-32 characters

name_localizations.type: dictionary with keys in available locales

comments.Description: Localization dictionary for name field. Values follow the same restrictions as name
Description for CHAT_INPUT commands, 1-100 characters. Empty string for USER and MESSAGE commands

description_localizations.type: dictionary with keys in available locales

comments.Description: Localization dictionary for description field. Values follow the same restrictions as description
Parameters for the command, max of 25
Set of permissions represented as a bit set
Indicates whether the command is available in DMs with the app, only for globally-scoped commands. By default, commands are visible.
Not recommended for use as field will soon be deprecated. Indicates whether the command is enabled by default when the app is added to a guild, defaults to true
Autoincrementing version identifier updated during substantial record changes

type.type: one of application command option type

comments.Description: Type of option
1-32 character name

name_localizations.type: dictionary with keys in available locales

comments.Description: Localization dictionary for the name field. Values follow the same restrictions as name
1-100 character description

description_localizations.type: dictionary with keys in available locales

comments.Description: Localization dictionary for the description field. Values follow the same restrictions as description
If the parameter is required or optional--default false

choices.type: array of application command option choice

comments.Description: Choices for STRING, INTEGER, and NUMBER types for the user to pick from, max 25
If the option is a subcommand or subcommand group type, these nested options will be the parameters
If the option is a channel type, the channels shown will be restricted to these types

min_value.type: integer for INTEGER options, double for NUMBER options

comments.Description: If the option is an INTEGER or NUMBER type, the minimum value permitted

max_value.type: integer for INTEGER options, double for NUMBER options

comments.Description: If the option is an INTEGER or NUMBER type, the maximum value permitted
For option type STRING, the minimum allowed length (minimum of 0, maximum of 6000)
For option type STRING, the maximum allowed length (minimum of 1, maximum of 6000)
If autocomplete interactions are enabled for this STRING, INTEGER, or NUMBER type option
comments.Name Note: autocomplete may not be set to true if choices are present.

comments.Description: 1-100 character choice name

name_localizations.type: dictionary with keys in available locales

comments.Description: Localization dictionary for the name field. Values follow the same restrictions as name
Value for the choice, up to 100 characters if string
comments.Type Note: Type of value depends on the option type that the choice belongs to.

comments.Description: ID of the command or the application ID
ID of the application the command belongs to
ID of the guild
Permissions for the command in the guild, max of 100
ID of the role, user, or channel. It can also be a permission constant
role (1), user (2), or channel (3)
true to allow, false, to disallow
